name: Depths Reaver
description:
Ahoy cabin lad! 'tis yer birthright t' claim Redbeard's coveted booty!

Usin' yer radar 'n yer pirate skills, ye must deep dive into all kinds o' shipwrecks t' find th' bounty.

But beware! Evil creatures await ye on yer journey. Will ye best them?

CONTROLS

Ship:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move.
  • Space bar to descend.

Pirate:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move.

Enjoy yer journey!
